page.title: 15TRANSPORT AND COMMUNICATION
page.content:
FROM GREAT HORKESLEY.
THE NEAREST LARGE TOWN TO GREAT HORKESLEY,WHICH LIES IN THE CENTRE OF THE GRID,IS COLCHESTER,WHICH IS FOUR AND A HALF MILES AWAY. THERE ARE TWO BUS SERVICES IN AND OUT OF GREAT HORKESLEY,ONE PRIVATE AND ONE COLCHESTER PUBLIC TRANSPORT.MOST PEOPLE TRAVEL BY CAR HOWEVER,SINCE THE BUS SEVICE IS QUITE INFREQUENT. NORFOLKS RUN A PRIVATE BUS SERVICE FROM NAYLAND TO COLCHESTER,WHICH COSTS 20 PENCE FOR CHILDREN AND 40 PENCE FOR ADULTS,FOR A SINGLE TRIP FROM GREAT HORKESLEY INTO COLCHESTER.THERE ARE ALSO SPECIAL SCHOOL BUSES-FREE-FOR ALL THOSE CHILDREN WHO GO TO SCHOOL IN COLCHESTER IE ST. HELENA. IF YOU WISH TO TRAVEL TO DESTINATIONS FURTHER AWAY,THEN YOU HAVE TO GO TO COLCHESTER RAILWAY OR COACH STATION.
